title: Can‚Äôt even get into the app
text: This is twice now I‚Äôve downloaded this app to get into team meeting when my home internet goes out, and I still cannot get through. This time I can‚Äôt even move forward in the app. Would give this no stars if I had a choice

title: Going from bad to worse
text: Not in the iOS version , but Windows version has quite a few annoying bugs. Here are a few for 1. Sharing screen hides the taskbar 2. Teams call doesn‚Äôt come through on all the connected devices or Web windows 3. When viewing someone‚Äôs screen, content looks quite squished

title: Needs a lot of improvement. This is an embarrassment
text:
Specifically for VisionOS, though I have various complaints for the desktop version as well.

I have a daily meeting with my team that is convenient to take on my VisionPro. Without fail, I have to force quit the app and rejoin the meeting in order for people to hear me. All other standard troubleshooting does not work. (Leaving meeting and rejoining, closing the app and re-launching, manually toggling mute button). Very annoying.

The tabs on the left seem to have a hard time updating on their own unless I look at the app and manually check through them. This makes it useless to have the app open where I can glance and see if I have new messages or new activity since I can never trust that it‚Äôs up to date. I have to make the app active and cycle through them. Beyond any annoyance level, this severely cripples the usability of the app as a standalone app, and makes it more of a nice gimmicky extension to running the app on another device.

Another app breaking thing is that some of the containers seem to have a defined minimum size, which is fair enough, lots of apps do that. However, the developers failed to take this into account when setting limits on the app window itself. you can easily make that app too narrow or too short to be able to see all the controls, for example the text input box to reply to messages. So unless you leave the app at the standard size it is when it launches, or make it huge; you are left to play this guessing game when resizing the window and hoping that you‚Äôve allowed room for everything, which you won‚Äôt know until you actually need the thing.

If this was some Indy app that was really cheap, or better yet free; these sorts of things one could live with hoping they are eventually fixed. However given that it‚Äôs a paid app from a TRILLION dollar company that I am forced to use for work, these sorts of things, especially aggregated all together are unforgivable. And yes, I realize the app itself is free, but you or an employer ends up paying for your account in some vast majority if not all use cases.

I waited to write a review hoping for a day one patch, then a week one or two, but it is coming up on a month since launch.

title: Ghost Notifications
text: I work off my phone and computer. With the new update I'll read a chat on the computer but I'll still have an unread badge notification on my phone app 1-2 hours after a chat was read from the computer. #sad

title: Clunky
text: Constantly have false badge notifications.

title: Notifications just stopped
text:
Tried all the possible steps that I found online and nothing solves! 

Unique way to solve is ‚Äúreset the settings‚Äù from my entire phone! So inconvenient they don't have a fix for this. 

This happened two times in a row within 1 year or less.

Using a iPhone 13 pro.

title: Ghost notifications
text: I have ghost notification badges on the app. No way to clear them out

title: App
text: I love the app it keep us close when we are not close . We all can talk and share all kind off topics and fix the issues we all have

title: Fix the notifications
text: It always shows unread notifications then they are gone when I open the app

title: Teams
text: App is great and functionality is broad.  Do not like our teams phone, but everything else makes communication across the business great.

title: Can‚Äôt think of anyone who would like Teams?
text: Nobody likes teams, especially after a vacation. That‚Äôs just a fact.

title: Connection
text: Would not allow me to connect to my meeting.

title: The worst
text: I don‚Äôt understand why is so difficult to connect with this app, every time I use is an struggle to connect, I‚Äôve tried with account (Microsoft 360) without account and is a nightmare. Please make it quick to connect, learn something from Zoom o Google (see what your competitors are doing)

title: Great app
text: So easy to use!!

title: Teams
text: Works great, beautifully organized too.

title: Bug with the login system
text: Seems to be a bug with logging in even after verifying yourself.

title: Upload profile
text: Image not clear and please allow user drop first before submit

title: Missing feature important
text: I am a teacher and need to disable students ability to reply to my announcements which is currently not doable from the iPhone app. Please add this ASAP!

title: Why to I have to log in every 2 hours??
text: This app is so frustrating and makes me log in every few hours. That is not a hyperbole and our corp help desk says that is common for this app.  Microsoft, please fix this and quit making me sign in multiple times a day, even when I leave the blasted app open on my phone and on the same network‚Ä¶.

title: Teams Rules
text: Excellent tool for collaboration on global programs

title: Needs sharing and whiteboard
text: Otherwise a nice app

title: Communication
text: Very good communication application

title: Ghost Notifications
text: Overall the app is good, but the notification on the app icon seem to show ghost or false positive notifications. Meaning it shows there are new notifications but when you open the app there is nothing new. This makes me wonder if I should turn off notifications and just check the app 2 or 3 times a day‚Ä¶ I still need to use Teams but this has gotten pretty annoying‚Ä¶

title: Ghost notifications
text: I keep getting ghost badge notifications. I also do not like the default notification sound, I wish it matched the old Microsoft teams chime.

title: Notifications stoped after latest update. Only displays badges.
text:
Turned on and off notifications. Reinstalled the app. Restarted the phone but notifications stopped.  I only get badges. Doesn‚Äôt matter if the app is in the background or fully closed. 

Someone forgot to turn on the switch for notification before baking the app to send to the App Store ü§¶üèª

title: New Teams is awful
text: In the new Teams they‚Äôve made it much harder to change your status. You can‚Äôt hover over the dock and change it anymore. Now you have to jump through hoops.

title: Rotation when in background
text: When you connect a second device to the same meeting without audio, it doesn‚Äôt allow you to rotate the screen and it‚Äôs very annoying because sometimes you can‚Äôt see since it‚Äôs too small if a computer screen is being mirrored in the meeting. Please add/fix this!

title: Screen sharing, or application sharing needed
text: Please provide a way to share a specific window or application

title: Communication
text: You like separating out important communications

title: Video calls crashing like crazy
text: Can no longer do video calls since about a week ago. Completely wiped and reinstalled. Latest IOS. Crashes constantly if video is turned on.

title: Good app
text: Easy to use and effective

title: Love this App
text: Too many reasons to list, but it‚Äôs perfect!

title: Battery Drain
text:
Since the recent updates I have noticed that the battery drain due to the app has increased.  A 30 minute meeting and some off and on replies and 20-30% of battery is drained.  

Other than the battery, app works great.

title: Super Handy!
text: I am getting to really like Teams.  At first it was much different than Zoom, so wasn‚Äôt sure I liked all the extra functions.  Now I‚Äôm happy to have the extra functions to increase my efficiency.  I would really like to see a blur option to soften facial features:) Ya .. I know Teams supposedly has a Madeline type Ap, but I haven‚Äôt yet figured that out.  Please just add a slider bar to the main camera display .. to make it easy.

title: People can‚Äôt hear me after 16.4
text: After the update a few days ago, I can only join calls with my AirPods. If I remove them, then people can‚Äôt hear me. I can still hear them, and the iPad shows that the microphone is active, but they can‚Äôt hear me. I tested this simulating a call and recording it and it all looks like it should be working on my side, but there was not sound coming from me on the test call recording. I checked in privacy settings and microphone is active. It‚Äôs annoying.

title: Network access to make Teams calls??
text: Why do I have to give network access to make calls? Calls come through just fine without network access. This is a new restriction. Why?

title: Annoying Fake Notifications
text: Constantly notifies me of several messages/notifications when I‚Äôve received 1 message and no other unread messages. Already don‚Äôt want to hear from work (but have to), so I don‚Äôt need unnecessary notifications.

title: Corrupts your files
text: I tried to use Teams on my ipad multiple times for work, but the encryption always corrupts my personal documents (on excel), so that I am unable to recover it. This is very frustrating. I also use Outlook for work and it is encrypted for work, but doesn‚Äôt interfere with my personal documents. I don‚Äôt understand why Teams is the only app with this problem.

title: Mainly Awesome
text: Love everything about Teams with one exception. If you need to use both a work account and a personal account, the work account hijacks things and makes trying to use the personal account super confusing and frustrating. Everything else is AMAZING!!! Really helps to collaborate with coworkers and stay productive.

title: Town hall calls
text: I‚Äôd like to see the ‚Äútown hall‚Äù (super large conference calls) allow me to turn off my screen without pausing the audio.

title: Extremely slow and buggy
text: It‚Äôs practically unusable. Please update the app, there has been no improvement since it debuted.

title: Mic Only works sometimes
text: The microphone only works occasionally

title: There are better Chat apps
text: Everything that I use in Teams, I wish it follows the progress of Line or WhatsApp or Kakao, etc. Teams is just not the best messenging app in the market. I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not the only one expressing by this disappointment

title: Made it worse
text: Recent updates don‚Äôt load the whole chat, making it impossible to keep up. Announcement format is not available for posts, meaning you can‚Äôt do that without a desktop. Imported app word documents move incredibly slowly and don‚Äôt mirror the original - ie colored text presents in black, so this is also no longer useful. I used to be able to do exactly the same tasks from teams in my phone as I could in teams on the desktop. No more. The app is terrible now.

title: Notifications all the time
text: Seems new updates have broken notifications. I‚Äôll have nothing new yet the app tells me I have over 10 unread notifications. App is up to date so what gives? This is irritating.

title: But why?
text:
I am required to use this for work, and it seems there‚Äôs always an issue between iOS and Microsoft, always an update that makes things worse and unreliable.   And now I don‚Äôt get notifications on iPhone.   

I do not recommend.  

Sure, Microsoft has business locked in with Office, but for real people, this app and most of their apps are nightmares of privacy and buggy behavior.   

Terrible.

title: Child training
text: Very easy to understand

title: Buggy and calls drop constantly while consumes all of IOS battery
text: Buggy and calls drop constantly while consumes all of IOS battery.  Really bad product for mobile.

title: Easy to use
text: I love the ease of use and how accessible I can be on the move.

title: Thankfully only for work use
text:
For many weeks, I've been getting 4-9 notifications symbols for every 1 message.  Now I get 4 notifications on Teams per every 1 Outlook email unrelated.  My settings are accurately checked/unchecked.

Still waiting on the update...
